Personalized shopping cart recommendations: Develop an AI-powered shopping cart recommendation system that learns customers' preferences and suggests relevant products based on their previous purchases and browsing history. This feature can increase customer satisfaction and encourage impulse purchases.

Augmented Reality (AR) Try-On: Create an AR-based virtual try-on feature for clothing and accessories. Customers can use their smartphone cameras to see how items would look on them without having to physically try them on. This feature can reduce returns and increase sales.

Automated Delivery and Pickup: Develop a smart shopping cart system that can automatically detect and notify customers when their purchases are ready for pickup or delivery. This feature can save time and reduce customer frustration.

Gamified Loyalty Program: Create a gamified loyalty program that rewards customers for repeat purchases and milestones achieved. Customers can earn points and redeem them for discounts, free products, or exclusive content. This feature can increase customer loyalty and retention.

Personalized Product Recommendations: Develop an AI-powered product recommendation engine that suggests products based on customers' preferences, purchase history, and browsing behavior. This feature can increase customer satisfaction and encourage impulse purchases.
